1.title: Choice

choices: At the Foot of a Mountain
At the Mouth of a Cave
In Front of a Strange Temple
11.content:
It happened one Friday afternoon, you decided to go camping in the forest. A friend of yours had told you where you could watch the sun set that was just beyond a grove of apple trees. It was supposed to be beautiful. You thought that you would be having a good time camping.

Unfortunately, on the drive over to where the woods were, the map blew out of the window and now you found yourself wandering all about the forest trying to make heads or tails of where you were. It was trying you up a wall as you slam your head on the table and let out a groan.

“Just beyond the grove of apple trees,” you grunt. “There isn’t an apple tree around for miles. Why did I lose that stupid map. Dammit!” You pound your fist on a nearby rock and then groan as you shake your hand. “Oh great,” you say. “What else could go wrong. Screw this, I’m getting out of here.”

Unfortunately, as you look back, you see that you don’t even recognize the path where you came in and from the looks of it, you were lost. You slap yourself in the face. “Now that’s just great.” You moan to yourself. What you needed was a compass. It would’ve helped if you brought one.

You curse your bad luck and carelessness as you’re wandering through the forest. You even kick at something that looks like a piece of fruit. Then you stop and you look down. “Huh?” you mutter. You look and gasp because you see that on the ground was a pear of some kind. But it was the wrong color. It was blue. You had never heard of a blue pear and you reach down to pick it up. “What the heck?”

You then see several oddly colored trees with more unusual fruit, such as blue lemons, pink apples and red bananas. You run in, wondering what is going on and soon you find yourself…
11.title: Into the Woods

111.content:
You find yourself at the foot of a mountain of some kind. The mountain looked jagged and from the looks of it, it was one of two mountains and the ways the mountains were shaped made them look like a pair of curved horns. “Okay,” you say. “Now things are really starting to get weird.”

But then you realized something. Climbing up the mountain might be to your advantage. You could probably get a good view of where you are and find your way out of the forest so you could go home. Wasting no time you start to climb the mountain. As you do, you see several trees with more of those unusual fruit such as green peaches, white cherries, pink kiwis and even some gray colored durians with strange spirals on them.

But then you see that the trees seem to be obscuring a village of some kind. You’d say something that looked like a mix of South American, ancient Chinese and African structure, but you couldn’t be one hundred percent sure what you were seeing because the trees blocked everything.

After half an hour you reach the top of the mountain and look out. But to your horror the forest just went on and on and there seemed to be no end in sight to the trees all around. “Oh no,” you groan. “Climbing this damn mountain got me nowhere.”

As you kick a few rocks you hear somebody speaking in a strange language that didn’t sound like any language from Earth. At least, not any that you recognize. Then you turn around and see a female anthropomorphic...
111.title: The Mountain

choices: Breathes an Enormous Fireball into the Air
1111.content:
You see that flying down from the sky was a bright red scaled dragon woman with a golden underbelly. She appeared to be a Chinese dragon based on her body shape and a rather tall one at that. Seven feet from the looks of it. She appeared to have bright blue lips and green hair reaching to her long tail and large hips and she appeared to be wearing a scaly Chinese looking two piece dress before she flew down.

You step back as the dragoness lands on a large rock and then stares down on you. She appears to be inspecting you as she stretches her neck down and then sniffs at you. She gives a snort and you step back as flames appear briefly out of her nose. The dragon also appears to be wagging her tail as she looks at you. You have no idea what this dragon wants. Does she want to eat you? No, those are European dragons. She’s clearly an eastern dragon. As opposed to barbaric western dragons, eastern dragons are known for being patient, wise and kind-hearted.

That’s what you heard. But this dragon woman looked suspicious. She was sniffing around you and you could hear motion coming from her insides. Heck, you can even hear a heartbeat coming from yourself and it was very loud. You wonder if that dragon is the leader of whatever creatures live in this area. You heard that dragons were revered as gods in China. Perhaps that dragon was a queen or chief, because you’re not sure that she could be a goddess. You don’t even know if this dragon could speak.

But then she rises up and stands in front of you, right before she...
1111.title: Here be Dragons

choices: Give you a great big kiss
Give you a great big hug

choices: The Phoenix Swoops Down and Snatches You Up
1112.content:
You see something coming from the sky that looks like its covered in bright pink and white flames. You gasp as a winged humanoid shape begins to soar down wreathed in those flames. You gasp because whatever those flames are covered in, it’s heading straight for you. You have to dive out of the way as that flaming object comes down and scorches the mountainside.

You look around in horror because there is fire everywhere and then you turn to see a 6-foot tall and extremely pear-shaped figure that is wreathed in pink fire standing atop a large rock. The flames were brighting bright and you see that the mysterious figure even has some form of beak-like face and appears to be feminine in appearance. Her eyes are glowing bright and then she opens up her wings You shield yourself as she flaps her wings and creates a small cyclone that extinguishes the fire around herself.

Then you see that with the flames in the area put out, the mysterious creature had extinguished the flames that she was wreathed in and you see that she is a pear-shaped humanoid phoenix woman with bright pink and white feathers and from the looks of it, she also had D-cup breasts and long golden blonde hair.

You couldn’t believe it. It would be strange enough to encounter a normal anthropomorphic animal, but this was no ordinary animal. She was a phoenix, an animal that wasn’t even supposed to exist at all, anthropomorphic or otherwise.

But before you can say anything on the matter...
1112.title: Firebird

1113.content: How about some more mundane mammals?
1113.title: Mammals

112.content:
In front of you was a giant cave. The opening looked almost like a large eye socket and it looked like there was another opening that was right above it and to the side of the cave was a large rock formation that looked like a maw filled with teeth. “Okay,” you say. “Now that’s just creepy. You hear some strange noises coming from the opening and step back. But then you also hear louder noises that sounding like shouting in some strange unintelligible language.

You didn’t want to know where those strange noises were coming from or what was making them and quickly run inside the cave. You gasp and pant. “I don’t know what’s out there,” you say. “And I don’t intend to find out. I’ll just wait in here until they’re completely gone and then… what the huh?” you see some strange writing on the wall as well as strange images that seemed to depict ancient people in strange costumes but from the looks of it they didn’t resemble any kind of human you could recognize. They almost looked like animals.

“What is this strange place?” You ask. You walk further down the cave and take out a flashlight to see where you’re going. At least you remembered to bring that with you. As you continue your walk down the cave, you see what look like unlit torches on the wall and on a rock there appears to be cutlery of some kind. You were beginning to think you stumbled upon the ruins of some ancient civilization. It would be an amazing discovery if you were an archaeologist, which you aren’t.

But then you realize something. That cutlery looks like it was made recently. What could… before you can say something you hear movement and you turn around as your flashlight reveals an anthropomorphic…
112.title: Cave of Wonders

113.content:
In front of you appears to be a river of some sort. “Good,” you say. “I could use some water.” You quickly drink some of the water and even splash some of it into your face as you begin to pant. There definitely was something not right about this forest.

After dousing your face a few times, you shake it off and inhale deeply. You mean, these odd looking trees and plants, there was no way they were real right. Perhaps you had gotten lost and you were imagining everything due to exhaustion and heat stroke. That’s it.

That wasn’t it. You look around and still see those strange fruits and unusual looking trees. Everything was real. You had literally come into a very strange and twisted neck of the woods. You then gag and spit out some of the water. Well, it didn’t appear to be poisonous but you had no idea where you were and couldn’t tell what would come out and jump at you. There was something about this place that gave you the creeps.

Sudden you realize that the river is much deeper than you originally thought and there was something coming up from it. Something that looked human-sized if not bigger. You’d say around 5-7 feet tall. You jump back as bubbles arise and the creature surfaces.

Soon you are looking at an anthropomorphic…
113.title: The River

choices: The Sea Lion Speaks to You in English
Another Anthro Swims Up From Below
1131.content:
Out of the water emerges a female humanoid sea lion, you'd say 7-feet tall but with large H-cup breasts and a 5-foot wide butt. She had blue fur and navy hair that was worn in a bob-cut. She was also stark naked. You look in surprise and slightly choke on water at the sight of this sea lion amazon. She was absolutely beautiful and you'd say that she even had curves on her curves. "Amazing." Is all you can say.

The sea lioness then looks at you and gasps before she speaks in a strange language that you can't even properly identify. She seemed nervous and her knees were even knocking. She accidentally bumps the rock that you're standing on with her hips and causes you to drop with a large splash into the water. You sputter as you're floating in the water and see that it was much deeper than it looked and there appeared to be some sort of trench at the bottom.

But you couldn't thing about what was laying below the water because you looked up to see the sea lion girl's legs flapping in front of you and her large flippered feet that moved about in a hypnotic motion. As you swim to get a closer look, you wind up bumping your head into the sea lioness's love tunnel, making her scream but you couldn't tell if it was from distress or arousal.

What happens now...?
1131.title: Sea Lion

choices: Inside a Cave of Some Sort
11312.content:
The sea lion swims back still screaming. “N-Now,” you say. “Calm down. I wasn’t trying too….” But then suddenly you could feel the water moving beneath you. “What the?” you ask. “What now? What’s going on?” Then you gasp because underneath the water there was someone or rather something that was coming up from the trench. From the shape of it, it was another female figure that looked as big and fat as the sea lion girl.

Then there’s a large splash from below the water that splashes you right in the face as you gasp. You have water in your eyes and you see that things are clearing up in front of you. You could slowly see a large and fat silver figure right next to the sea lion girl.

You then shake your head to get a good look at the figure. She was a 7-foot tall and 5-foot wide walrus woman with a silver body and long light blue hair with a black highlight in it. She was as large as the sea lioness who was shivering at the sight of you.

The sea lion woman spoke to the walrus girl in anthro language and the walrus spoke back. They seemed to be referring to you. You gulp and realize that it would probably be the best idea to go away. You try to swim off but then that large walrus girl swam in front of you. You bounce your head off of her breathes before she gives you a swift head butt and renders you unconscious.

Then you wake up….
11312.title: A Pair of Pinnipeds

1132.content:
A massive head breaks the surface of the water, followed by a thick neck and a set of broad shoulders, all covered in thick dark grey hide. The figure rises up and up, higher and higher out of the river, water pouring off of its colossal form in streams as you look on in petrified awe, finally getting a good look at the.... hippo?!

Yes, standing up to its waist in the river is an anthropomorphic hippopotamus. As it steps out of the river, water still dripping down its massive form, you realize just how massive it is; at least 10 or 11 feet tall. What's more, it's, well, very much a female. She's totally nude, with wide hips and thighs as thick as small tree trunks with an ass that could easily cover you entirely, a massive plump belly, and a humongous pair of breasts that are each easily larger than your entire torso, all on a figure that's nicely padded out with a layer of soft flab underlain with noticeable toned muscles, you suddenly find your shorts feeling entirely too tight for your growing erection. A tiny hippo tail flicks at an insect from its position just about the hippo-woman's massive jiggling rear, and her hands and feet each end in three thick digits, all ending in thick almost hoof-like nails. Now that you look more closely at her head, you notice that her features are a bit softer, more rounded than the hippos you've seen in zoos and in books, but as she yawns and stretches her arms out, sticking out her immense chest even more, you see that she still definitely has the vicious tusks and fangs of a real hippopotamus.

Despite your obvious arousal at the sight of the hippopotamus woman, you decide to beat a hasty retreat from this place. You've read about what hippos can do to humans, and you don't want to stick around long enough to see what a ten-foot-tall one will do to you when she realizes that you were spying on her while she was naked. You slowly begin to back away....


Only for a stick to noisily snap underneath your foot. The hippo-woman's head swivels towards the source of the noise, her eyes widening when she sees you.

...Oh, shit.

You turn and try to run, but the hippo charges towards you with a burst of shocking speed. Oh, right - hippos can outrun horses in short bursts. Now trapped, you look up nervously at the titanic woman, while she looks down on you, her eyes positively gleaming with....
1132.title: Hippopotamus

11323.content:
"Why, hello there, little human." The hippo purrs, her voice a low, sultry baritone. "I haven't seen one of your kind in a long, long while. Now, what's a cute little thing like you doing all the way out here?"

You shrink back a little bit under the gargantuan hippopotamus' stare, more than a little bit surprised at the fact that she's not only talking, but seems to be putting the moves on you. You're not exactly a prime specimen - girls never really gave you more of a second look. To be told by someone like this massive stranger, quite possibly one of the most beautiful things you've ever seen, that you're flat-out cute is more than a little shocking.

"What's the matter, little guy?" She asks with a little smile, leaning down and showing off the deep cleavage of her bare beanbag chair-sized breasts, coloring your cheeks a vivid red in response. "Cat got your tongue? Or have you never seen someone like me before?" You can only nod dumbly at the second question, and the titanic woman smiles again.

"That's understandable, little guy - not a lot of anthros live outside of this forest anymore, and certainly no males. We've been dropping like flies over the years because of that - no way to keep up our numbers." The hippo's grin widens, and she looks down at you with an expression of lust and hunger. "But maybe.... maybe you can help with that."
11323.title: Lust.

Behind you appear to be the ruins of a temple of some kind. It looked like a temple at least given that there appeared to be eighteen statues surrounding it. They all looked like humanoid animals. Probably deities of some sort. From the looks of it, this was a civilization similar to ancient Egypt.

You then see the inside of the temple and see what looks like a burning fire. “Huh?” you ask. You quickly run inside and see that there does seem to be a fire burning in the center of the room and from the looks of it, it was on top of an idol that looked like a chimera of some sort with five heads, each depicting a different sort of beast that you could barely identify.

You look around to see paintings of wild beasts in different colors on the walls and then you see even more paintings that seem to depict the beasts somehow transforming into more humanoid forms and even more paintings that resembled ghosts and mythological animals.

All these paintings made you wonder what kind of people lived here. But then you heard strange singing in a language you couldn’t identify and then you hide behind the idol. You hear movement and into the temple walks an anthropomorphic…
114.title: The Temple

choices: She see you out in the open!

11432.content:
Pegasus:

The Anthropomorphic creature swing in and land right in front of you. She moves beyond the fire in the center of the room and walk toward the idol that you are now hiding. You are pretty well hidden from behind the idol, but are able to see being clearly. The first thing you notice ..is the being in front of you is definitely female. The creature also has a pair of large wings…and she kind of tall. Her “dress” of sort was quite revealing. Her arms of bares, as well os her legs, and midriff. A large strap of cloth cover hide her nipples and covered some of her breast, but you could see both the cleavage that she has and the under carriage of her breasts. Her skirt is short, having trouble covering her wide hips.

As the creature moves closer, you notice just what kind of creature she is. Her long mane of hair, long muzzle and other equine features, mark her of some kind of horse woman. You noticed that her fur is a deep chestnut brown, but her mane and tail seem to be blue, with red highlight.

That unexpected.

The horse woman, no.. a Pegasus moved with some grace, even through her feet are hooves.. You count only three fingers on her hands, as She moves around, waving away a sort of staff in front of her. She begins to speak,

“Ha All, Venta Mee”

She say the phase over and over again, this time in a sing-song pattern. You quickly realized the Pegasus is singing the same language that you have heard earlier. After a while she stopped speaking. She then move away, going to another of the 18 statues,. It harder to hear from where you are, but you are sure that she is singing something different than what she was speaking before. She says the different phase over and over, then stop after a while of chanting . She then goes to yet another statue. Just as she was getting in front of one, the both are you are startled by a noise to the side. A figure zoom by, covered by a robe and hooded, giving you no clue of what the figure could be expect it’s tall and fast. 115.content:
You see some thick bushes and they appear to be moving. You step back and gulp as you hear a strange muttering. However, your curiosity starts to get the better of your fear and you step closer towards the bushes.

Whatever was in the bushes runs out before you can see what it was. You then start to shiver. “I probably don’t want to know what that was.” You then see strange footprints but from the looks of it, the footprints were blurred but also from the looks of it, they were animalistic but somehow looked too big or too oddly shaped to properly be human footprints. Now that was bizarre.

You shiver and realize that something really weird is in the forest and you didn’t want to know what it was. But suddenly you find yourself yelling as you’re hoist into the air. You look down and see that you had walked right into a snare trap of some kind.

You try to yell again but you have part of the net stuck into your mouth. You must’ve walked into a hunter’s trap. But wait, who was the hunter? As you’re struggling in the trap, something walks towards you. It looks like an anthropomorphic...
115.title: The Trap

choices: To an Auction of Some Sort
1151.content:
It was a large anthropomorphic red furred goat woman with large black curved horns. She was incredibly pear-shaped and had an udder that was twice as big as her head with muscular arms and E-cup breasts. She also had golden blonde hair and appeared to be wearing nothing more than a loincloth and a pair of light blue sunglasses. She also had markings on her body like a tribal warrior of some sort and was holding a spear of some kind

You were obviously her quarry and she was obviously the one who set the trap. You shook in her rap before she tossed her spear to cut the net down, with you still trapped inside. You land with a thump on the ground and groan. As you're still trying to recover, the goat woman grabs the end of the net and looks down at you as if she's inspecting you. She seems pleased with what she's caught and lets out an evil laugh of some kind. Now you are really scared. From the looks on it, you were in a forest populated by anthropomorphic animal amazons. You had no idea how they react to humans in their territory, but from this goat woman who captured you. It can't be anything good.

But where does that goat woman take you?
1151.title: The Goat Amazon

11512.content:
As you were wondering what that red goat amazon was going to do with you, she unceremoniously tossed you into a wooden cage of some sort as you grunted. She even let out a laugh and then spoke with you in some sort of anthro language. You couldn't understand what she said but from the sound of it, it didn't seem to bode well for you. She then slammed the cage shut and locked it before she carried it with one hand over her head. Damn, she was strong. But you wonder. What do the anthro amazons do with humans around here. You really hope it has no cannibalistic intent.

Suddenly the goat woman slams down the cage with you inside of it. Then you here movement and from the looks of it, you were in the center of some anthro village. There were anthers of all kinds around you; felines, canines, pachyderms, ungulates, bats and birds. There were even some marine mammals. From the looks of it, the largest one was 7-feet-tall and the smallest was 5-feet tall. They were all well-built and from the looks of it, they were as nubile as could be and had markings on them similar to the goat woman.

Speaking of which, the goat woman stomped her foot and spoke in some weird language and the other anthros begun to clamor as well. From the sounds of it, you were at an auction and you were the merchandise. You're now more worried than ever about what these anthers have potentially in store for you. You hear several anthros yell in different language, obviously bidding higher. You wonder who finally buys you.

Suddenly the goat woman yells out and you realize you've been sold. But what kind of anthro bought you?

You're really starting to feel like an object now.

You feel your cage being lifted up as the cow woman hoists it onto her shoulder. She then walks away from the auction, presumably to her home. You do get the feeling they might be talking about you though, as the panther looks at you while she talks. The cow is probably just bragging about her new purchase.

When the two anthros go their separate ways the cow walks up to a hut. She opens the door and walk inside, tossing your cage on the floor as she enters. You stare up at her wondering what she plans to do. She opens your cage and...
115121.title: Sold To A Cow

1151211.content:
You shrink back as the cow woman opens the cage and reaches in. She tries to get you you to come out, smiling and beckoning you with her hand. When you don't move however she gets a little impatient and reaches in to grab you. You give a yelp as you are dragged out by the scruff of your neck and dropped onto the floor. You stare up at her as she stands there with her hands on her hips. Your eyes are drawn to her massive breasts, then go down to her udder. She notices your staring and snaps her fingers a couple of times to get your attention. When you look up at her face she gives you a grin.

The cow grabs you once again and carries you over to a corner where you see a broom. She picks it up and holds it up for you. After saying something in her language she begins sweeping, clearly intending for you to watch. Then she hands you the broom and points to the floor. You look down and see various litter on the floor. Being a hut in the forest it of course won't be clean, but it appears she wants to clear away the debris. You get to work and sweep up the leaves, pebbles, and even bones littering the floor. As you do your new owner is sitting in a chair watching you. She appears to be satisfied and gives you a pat on the ass when you pass by her.

After a while you manage to get the floor clean. Well, as clean as a dirt floor can be. Your owner retreated to her room for a nap, leaving you to your cleaning. It dawns on you that this is the perfect chance to escape, but then you think about what comes next. There's a whole village of these creatures out there, so maybe you're better off in here. What do you do?
1151211.title: Chore Boy

choices: Giving You a Huge French Kiss
11512111.content:
Just as you feel the urge to make a run for it, your reason kicks in and overrules it. No, it's not possible this huge cow woman would simply leave you to it, at least not without binding you in some way, without some form of insurance. It's a test. It's gotta be a test, you reason. Either she's waiting for you to bolt in order to catch and discipline you or someone else is waiting to stop you and haul you back. That's gotta be it. You may not have asked to be here among these creatures, but you do know that you'll have to bide your time if you want to make an actual escape. You need to survive and you need to learn at least how to communicate with these animal women. In order to do that, you need to keep your new mistress happy and you need a protector. The only way to do that in this situation is to make yourself useful and therefore valuable to your mistress.

"Okay," you mutter to yourself, "You want a clean house, cow-lady? You're gonna get one."

You roll up your sleeves as it were and get down to business. The hut itself isn't enormous and the furnishings and possessions aren't exactly copious, so it's not that difficult to clean and organize it completely. As a matter of fact, cleaning up the place from top to bottom gives your body something to do while your mind attempts to work out your situation. As a matter of fact, you find yourself running out of things to do in order to make the hut cleaner than it was when your new mistress awakens from her nap and comes out to see how you're getting on. You're putting the cleaning implements back where they were when she emerges from her bedroom and you glance back to see her looking around the place with a huge smile and a nod. She then looks to you and you swallow hard, chancing a small smile in her direction as if seeking her approval. The expression you get in return shows that you've greatly exceeded her expectations.

She says something to you in her strange language as she strolls up to you and runs a finger across your cheek in an unmistakably affectionate gesture. You take a chance and lean into her touch a little. You've got to get on her good side. Whatever happens, she's got to value your safety and well-being for this to work.

"I just wish I could understand you," you say.

Your speech takes her by surprise and she blinks a moment. She seems to think something over and then nods and surprises you by...

She appeared to have green face paint on and was wearing a white tunic and appeared to have huge breasts the size of watermelons. Another sister from the looks of it. 1152.title: 3 Lions

choices: You Put up a Fight and Try to Escape
11522.content:
"This one's mine, sisters," the blue lioness says as she gets on all fours and pushes her belly against the ground. "I've been waiting for one like him." You then scream and struggle in an attempt to try and get out of the net but the lioness growls and leaps into the air with her enormous blue belly that pins you to the ground. "Don't eat me! I taste horrible!" The lioness looks at you angrily and roars. "Eat a human?! What kind of beasts do you think we are?!" She seemed offended. "Y-You don't eat h-humans? But wait. If you don't eat humans, why did you trap me?" The lioness gives a growl and licks you in the ear and nose as you groan in discomfort. "Because," says the lion as she rubs her enormous belly. "Around here, humans are the only men we have. Around this time every year, humans like you are lost in the woods and the amazons around here have the only opportunity for the whole year to satisfy more.... carnal desires. But men are so brittle compared to us and so we often have to resort to force and trickery, to get what we want."

You then gasp. From the context, the lion wanted to mate with you! She and her sisters set that trap to catch a man, not food. You try to escape but then the lioness shifts her big belly and places it on your head as you're shaking underneath. You didn't come out in the woods to get asphyxiated in a lioness's fat stomach. The amazon then steps on your arms with good measure. "Now," says the huge gutted lioness. "Are you going to surrender? Or do I have to get rough with you, my little toy?"
11522.title: Set the Record Straight

1153.content: What tip of anthro is it?
1153.title: More Options

choices: At the Foot of a Mountain
At the Mouth of a Cave
In Front of a Strange Temple
12.content:
It happened one Friday afternoon, you decided to go camping in the forest. A friend of yours had told you where you could watch the sun set that was just beyond a grove of apple trees. It was supposed to be beautiful. You thought that you would be having a good time camping.

Unfortunately, on the drive over to where the woods were, the map blew out of the window and now you found yourself wandering all about the forest trying to make heads or tails of where you were. It was trying you up a wall as you slam your head on the table and let out a groan.

“Just beyond the grove of apple trees,” you grunt. “There isn’t an apple tree around for miles. Why did I lose that stupid map. Dammit!” You pound your fist on a nearby rock and then groan as you shake your hand. “Oh great,” you say. “What else could go wrong. Screw this, I’m getting out of here.”

Unfortunately, as you look back, you see that you don’t even recognize the path where you came in and from the looks of it, you were lost. You slap yourself in the face. “Now that’s just great.” You moan to yourself. What you needed was a compass. It would’ve helped if you brought one.

You curse your bad luck and carelessness as you’re wandering through the forest. You even kick at something that looks like a piece of fruit. Then you stop and you look down. “Huh?” you mutter. You look and gasp because you see that on the ground was a pear of some kind. But it was the wrong color. It was blue. You had never heard of a blue pear and you reach down to pick it up. “What the heck?”

You then see several oddly colored trees with more unusual fruit, such as blue lemons, pink apples and red bananas. You run in, wondering what is going on and soon you find yourself…
12.title: Famale

info.brief_description: You wander into an ancient forrest that is inhabited by Furries.
info.description:
One day while youÂ´re walking, you get lost in a forrest youÂ´ve seen or been in before. It reveals to be inhabited by different kinds furries, and it happens to be MATING SEASON, so pray to the gods that they be kind you!


1. The main character is male or female.

2. Gay sex (men on men) is not allowed, however lesbian sex is encouraged.

3. No deaths.

4. Try to add long chapters (a paragraph at least).

5. NO VORE or anything like that.

6. The furries are five to seven feet tall.

Enjoy!


Reward: 1000 Gps per chapter
